General.Name: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited
General.Description: Well Graded Engineering Public Company Limited operates as a construction contractor in Thailand. It provides turnkey commercial and residential construction services, as well as related technical consultancy services for the engineering and architecture sectors. It also offers after-sales service, including warranties and claims, technical advice, and maintenance service. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
